name: Mavitech
description:
Mavitech is not yet another Magento eCommerce tech company. Unlike many other vendors, we not only come up with a bunch of developers ready to resolve your tasks, we like to think of ourselves as a remote partner who proactively contributes to the growth and prosperity of the company that we happen to work with.
We started in 2012 as a purely Magento custom development team and evolved into a full-cycle ecommerce agency in 2015, mainly because we saw how our clients responded to our bringing additional value to their businesses through various growth hacks, dozens of handy integrations, very useful tweaks and add-ons. We transformed into a company capable of creating a meticulously verified digital roadmap for almost any online retailer by putting together the effort of both parties, utilizing online strategy, email marketing (which is one of our strongest feats), SEO/PPC that actually work, years of experience with best-in-class solutions for Magento and overall ecommerce best practices.
On the technical side of things, having developers who have previously released or collaborated on over a 100 bestselling Magento extensions, having successfully been through over 50 mid to large-scale projects and having done every possible Magento integration, the platform no longer holds any secrets for us as we basically know it inside out.
Our passion for helping retailers grow coupled with incessant and a little naive desire to make a difference make it all a seamless and very pleasant experience for our clients as we know perfectly well how much they care about timely communication and outstanding service quality.
Go ahead and drop us a line so we can make a difference for you too!
